text:
Hello! I hit an issue with the user roles and I'm not sure if this is a bug or a feature.

Even though I am Super Admin, I can't access the Page Editor. Can anyone help with this, please?
Do you have content partitioning on?
<@U25C65C3S> I have no idea where to look for that
The closest I can find looks like this
looks like it's not on. i'd hit up HS support -- Seems like a bug

Hi all, I have installed a tracking code for LeadForensics on a HubSpot portal in the Header section for website pages but it's not firing.  The Google Analytics one is but not this one and I've verified the code.  HubSpot support can't help so maybe someone here has seen it before?
<@UDYA15HHV> there is an `document.body is null` error on your page that means there is some script on head section, that use body.

Thanks <@UCH1L597V> - sorry should have been clearer ... we are trying to get Lead Forensics up and working on another HubSpot website.  In order to do this you need to put some Lead Forensics tracking code on the HubSpot site so that Lead Forensics can track activity on the other website.  I've attached the Header HTML with id content blocked out - just in case as its a clients portal! Lead Forensics code is last part - <script type="text/javascript" src="https://secure.redd7liod.com/js/155673.js" ></script>
<noscript><img alt="" src="https://secure.redd7liod.com/155673.png" style="display:none;" /></noscript>
sorry i got that wrong
Thanks for looking anyway Umakant :slightly_smiling_face:

Hello! It's me again :slightly_smiling_face: I got another question. How do I designate a template for the Resubscribe Request email? When I click on the `publish email` link, I get this screen. I copied the template from another portal, but it is not recognized
is there a general list of all parameters HS would potentially append to a URL? for some reason SEMRush is picking up all the UTM params and what not (granted UTM is GA but still i got those)

Hey all, I have a quick question that I can’t find an answer for. Is there an issue with adding a breadcrumb menu to a flex column? I try to add one at the template level and it works outside the flex column, but not within (it displays the menu with the wrong items). Any thoughts?
I.e. It renders like this within a flex column.
And like this outside the flex column (this is how it should look).
trying to reproduce
hold please
Thanks!
The other clue I see is that HS adds different classes to the breadcrumb within the flex column than to the one outside the flex column.
This is the one that is incorrect.
This is the one that is correct. It is the same module.
Hello, guys, anyone knows if possible to make an PWA with HubSpot, i was able to install my manifest.json but i cant put my service worker in the root
for some reason, my breadcrumb menu isnt printing at all :disappointed:  not sure why.  sorry couldnt verify for you
<@UC2Q8ABAB> According to this the idea has been submitted.
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/PWA-and-Service-Worker-support/idi-p/180007>
Service Worker doc
Oh i see. Thank u
Ok thanks for trying.

I’m transitioning my clients’s video hosting from Wistia to HubSpot and was wondering if there is a way to do the Popover effect like in the wistia platform? Anyone done something like this before or know a best practice here?
yes it’s possible but no it’s not easy to do do yet until HubSpot finishes finalizing their embed codes
Sorry for the late update. We have enabled on QA. We will let it run there for some time before we enable it on prod.
Sounds good, thanks Libo!
One thing I am still discussing with the team about to make the script cache longer. Otherwise, you will see it get minified one time, then next it will be un-minified. That is very confusing now.
thanks <@U7SL518D6> - this is something HubSpot is working on though?

yes, there have been ongoing discussions with <@U6W3H6YN8> and one of the other devs who have been doing work on the video embeds. It has sounded like the embed codes are being more finalized. which will make this easier for us to work with without risking things breaking down the road. They also have stated they will be posting documentation for those, it just hadn’t been finished yet
Yep, documentation is still pending a few changes on our end (we are trying to handle some parameters automatically)

Anyone know of anyone doing to HubSpot migrations? There are always some large ones we turn down because HubSpot won't migrate (generally too many pages) -- Wondering if you know of any resources or agencies/freelancers that have done a good job for you and would recommend.
We've done migrations to HubSpot for many clients.
ok wonderful - thanks <@U7SL518D6> and <@U6W3H6YN8>

<@UDYA15HHV> are you adding that code to the header html under 'default for all domains`? It's possible there is some header HTML under the domain where you actually need this code to fire...in which case, it would cancel out what is in the 'default for all domains' header HTML.
Hey all! Does anybody know at what point in the custom module editing process the content that is actually living in other pages gets written over?
(e.g. I edit something on the actual module template --- publish it... now a page that has it has the default text/settings of the module)

when you plop a CM into a page it’s data is the defaults, this stays true until you edit the module within the page, at that point they are set at the page level and you cannot go back to defaults without manually changing
...odd... I've definitely seen them overridden with certain edits, I'm just wanting to isolate which changes which which that is the case.
I believe if you change the module name or the field name, it will overwrite content as you are mentioning

Changing the default content in the DM wont do anything, its when you change the physical name of the fields/module that it causes issues (at least i believe that was what happened when I did it aawhile back)
Word. Thanks. That's what I was thinking. Just wanted to confirm
We also have to keep under the 10 query limit :wink:. No exceptions!
